title: ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 59 Specialist & Senior Resident Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation, Haryana (ESIC Haryana) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 59 Specialist & Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, Post-graduation, and PGDM can apply for the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview.
